HomePage.title: Your brand, our products
HomePage.purpose: We develop partnerships in nutritional supplements for the physical and mental well-being of the whole family, through products that are responsible with our community and environment.
HomePage.why_us: Why choose us to manufacture your products?
HomePage.point_eleven: We offer a complete package for your manufacture process
HomePage.feature_one: Our Experience and Reputation: 5 decades in the market, pioneers in nutritional supplements.
HomePage.feature_two: Innovation Capacity: Development of new products and innovative formulas.
HomePage.feature_three: Production Flexibility: Ability to adapt formulas and volumes according to client needs.
HomePage.join_us: Join thousands of companies already transforming their business with

ProductPage.title: Product development
ProductPage.description: A scientific and rigorous approach to the development of high quality food supplements, which we offer for your manufacturing service.
ProductPage.subtitle: Our manufacturing process
ProductPage.survey_description: We begin with a meeting to understand your specific needs and product objectives. Our team analyzes every detail and provides you with a clear quotation that includes production costs, ingredients, and estimated times, ensuring you have all the information needed to make informed decisions.
ProductPage.formulation_description: At this stage, our team of experts work to create customized formulas aligned with your requirements. We design the product, start with the correct selection of ingredients, corroborate their role in the formula, evaluate new raw materials required and pilot test the product for efficacy, taste, texture and functionality. This ensures that the end result meets your and your customers' expectations. We will send you a free sample for your approval and complete satisfaction. Finally, we design your labels to present you with a complete prototype so you can tangibly see how your ideas become a Food Supplement ready for your business.
ProductPage.planing_description: Once the formula is approved, we proceed with detailed production planning. We coordinate resources with certified suppliers, schedule manufacturing, and ensure that each step of the process is carried out with the highest quality, safety, and efficiency. Our methodical approach minimizes errors and optimizes delivery times.
ProductPage.delivery_description: We give you personalized attention through your Key Account Executive, who will support you in all administrative matters, doubts and congratulations.
ProductPage.creative_lab_description: Our design laboratory combines science and engineering to develop your products; it is equipped with advanced technology, complies with Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) regulations and health authority guidelines on Food Supplements. Our in-house Engineering Centre specializes in pilot testing of your products, stability and safety testing and packaging, ensuring a quality and functional product with the correct scale-up to the manufacturing lines.  We foster a collaborative environment for rapid prototyping and customization.
ProductPage.team: Expert Team in New Product Design
ProductPage.team_description: Our multidisciplinary team of formulation and nutrition experts is dedicated to research and innovation. With a deep understanding of market trends, we develop products that meet high standards and resonate with consumers. Collaboration with our clients ensures that each product aligns with market demands and end-user needs.
ProductPage.discover: Discover the supplements we have for you!
ProductPage.discover_description: Contact us today to learn more about our customized formulas and, with our experience, how we can help you take your brand to the next level. Request a free consultation and start transforming your ideas into high quality products, we are here to help!

AboutPage.title: Our History
AboutPage.description: Our Experience and Reputation: 3 decades in the market, pioneers in dietary supplements.
AboutPage.paragraph_1: Since 1995, we have been pioneers in the supplement market, accumulating more than two decades of experience and knowledge in the industry. Over the years, we have experienced exponential growth, expanding our team tenfold and adopting advanced technologies that allow us to offer the highest quality products in supplement manufacturing.
AboutPage.paragraph_2: Our passion for innovation has led us to establish a modern engineering center, based on principles of continuous improvement. In our processes, we manage our operations under the aion® management system, an advanced platform that effectively integrates operational excellence concepts across all areas and levels of the organization. Thanks to this approach, we are in the process of obtaining Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) and ISO 9001 certifications within the same year, ensuring the quality and safety of our products.
AboutPage.paragraph_3: We are proud to have a winning-minded team aligned with our mission to 'develop partnerships in dietary supplements.' We firmly believe that by working together, we can achieve great goals and continue transforming the industry. At aion®, extraordinary things happen every day. Come and find the passion you need with us to develop your dietary supplements.
AboutPage.purpose: We develop partnerships in dietary supplements for the physical and mental well-being of the whole family, through products that are responsible with our community and our environment.
AboutPage.integrity_description: I act with honesty and consistency.
AboutPage.responsibility_description: I say what I do and do what I say.
AboutPage.respect_description: I value and consider the diversity and dignity of all.
AboutPage.sense_of_urgency_description: I prioritize and act with speed and efficiency.
AboutPage.excellence_description: I continually seek to improve established standards.
AboutPage.common_good_description: I act with the collective interest in mind.
AboutPage.communication_description: I share information clearly, openly, and promptly.
AboutPage.teamwork_description: I collaborate and actively contribute to achieving common goals.
AboutPage.client_driven_description: I focus my actions on meeting and exceeding the expectations of internal and external clients.
AboutPage.team_paragraph_1: Our executive team is composed of professionals with over 100 years of combined experience in various industries, including food, tobacco, graphic arts, beverages, and consulting. This rich diversity of backgrounds allows us to approach market challenges with a broad and creative perspective.
AboutPage.team_paragraph_2: We have cultivated an agile and empowered organization, where each day represents a new opportunity for the growth and development of our staff. We foster a collaborative and dynamic work environment where ideas are valued, and each team member can contribute to collective success.
AboutPage.team_paragraph_3: We firmly believe that the talent and experience of our team are key to driving innovation and excellence in our services. Together, we face the challenges of the future with determination and vision, committed to sustainable development and the well-being of our partners and clients.
AboutPage.quality_policies_paragraph_1: The management of aion® is committed to guiding all our activities toward meeting the needs and expectations of our customers and stakeholders. Our quality policy is based on the following principles:
AboutPage.quality_policies_principle_1: Quality is everyone's responsibility at AION, starting from the management to every member of the organization.
AboutPage.quality_policies_principle_2: We manage our actions with aligned objectives. With a solid understanding of our processes, integrating feedback from our stakeholders, and applying root cause analysis to continuously improve products and services.
AboutPage.quality_policies_principle_3: We focus on understanding and meeting our customers' requirements, as well as legal and regulatory requirements.
AboutPage.quality_policies_principle_4: We proactively identify and manage risks, responding quickly and effectively to any situation that may affect quality.
AboutPage.quality_policies_principle_5: We pay attention to technological evolution and constantly seek improvements in our processes and products.
AboutPage.quality_policies_paragraph_2: Through these guidelines, AION reaffirms its commitment to quality as a fundamental strategy for the success and sustainability of our organization.

TechPage.title: Our Technologies
TechPage.description: When we say that our processes have technology in their DNA, we mean it!
TechPage.capsules_description: Capsules are a convenient and efficient way to consume dietary supplements, providing a precise dose and protecting active ingredients.
TechPage.tablets_description: We use unicolor and bicolor rotary compression machines; our installed capacity ensures large-scale supply to meet demand at all levels.
TechPage.powders_description: Powders have highly versatile, multiproduct applications; discover our different packaging and portability options.
TechPage.liquids_description: The process of manufacturing liquid beverages involves complex steps and a variety of technologies to ensure the final product is safe, high quality, and meets customer requirements.
TechPage.gels_description: Mixing, gelling, viscosity control, and packaging technologies play a crucial role in creating effective and stable gels, whether for pharmaceutical, cosmetic, or food applications.
TechPage.ointments_description: Creams are products based on the combination of active and inactive ingredients through an emulsion process.
TechPage.information_system_description: Track your product's process in real-time.
TechPage.Traceability_description: A system that always allows you to know all variables of your products.
TechPage.regulation_description: We comply with all required standards and beyond.
TechPage.staff_description: All personnel are certified in their processes.
TechPage.management_system_description: We all operate with a focus on customer value, emphasizing the most important aspect: the product.
TechPage.software_description: Excel and native platforms are a thing of the past; we manage with an end-to-end MRP and CRM.
TechPage.operational_capabilities_description: From 500 units to 1 million, your creativity is our challenge.
TechPage.Operational_excellence_description: We all work under the same concept: 'PDCA'. We Plan our goals, Develop our processes, Check our results, and Act accordingly.

FaqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FaqPage.description: At aion®, we make it possible!
FaqPage.faq: Do you have questions? Find the answers here
FaqPage.A1: We maintain a confidentiality agreement with our clients, so we do not disclose their information, brands, or products.
FaqPage.A2: aion® is a leader in supplement manufacturing in Mexico. “We develop partners in dietary supplements for the physical and mental well-being of the whole family, through products that are responsible with our community and environment.”
FaqPage.Q3: Do you have a product idea but don’t know which ingredients to use?
FaqPage.A3: We help you create a custom formulation that aligns with your requirements.
FaqPage.Q4: Do you know the formulation but are unsure how to present it?
FaqPage.A4: We develop the presentation and branding of your product to make it stand out in the market. Your formulation will remain confidential, and we can manufacture it in our Creative Lab, Engineering Center, and Production Plant.
FaqPage.Q5: Do you already have the formulation and presentation but don’t know how to launch it?
FaqPage.A5: Our specialized consultants are here to help you with a successful market launch.
FaqPage.Q6: What is the cost of product development?
FaqPage.A6: We advise our clients at every stage at no cost, as our philosophy is a win-win approach and building long-term partnerships with high-potential business partners.
FaqPage.Q7: What is the standard shelf life of products?
FaqPage.A7: The approximate shelf life of capsules and tablets is 3 years; for powders, it is 2 years; and for liquids and cosmetic products, 1 year.
FaqPage.Q8: How do I choose the right packaging?
FaqPage.A8: We have dozens of options for you to choose the look of your product. Ask for our catalogs.
FaqPage.Q9: Can you help with my label design?
FaqPage.A9: Absolutely! We have a team of creative designers and experts who can design your label in compliance with the health authority requirements in Mexico.
FaqPage.Q10: Do you offer label printing services?
FaqPage.A10: We have our own printing and graphic arts center to offer you a complete, customized project.
FaqPage.Q11: What is the minimum order for labels?
FaqPage.A11: Depending on the type of label selected, minimum order quantities are set and can be used for subsequent orders.
FaqPage.A12: We develop your prototype, and once the quote is approved, we request a 50% deposit to begin production of your contract manufacturing.
FaqPage.Q13: What documents are provided with each order?
FaqPage.A13: We accompany your order with the product's technical sheet, nutritional information, and quality certificate.
FaqPage.Q14: How long does it take to deliver my order?
FaqPage.A14: The average delivery time is 3 to 4 weeks from the final design of your label; for special projects, the time varies depending on the product’s characteristics. For imported raw materials, the delivery time is 6 to 8 weeks.
FaqPage.A15: We work with all couriers or your own national shipping method.
FaqPage.Q16: Can I send my order to different locations?
FaqPage.A16: We have the flexibility and logistics to distribute to your different distribution centers nationwide.
FaqPage.A17: We issue electronic invoices for all our services, including a 16% VAT and 0% IEPS.
FaqPage.A18: We would be delighted to welcome you. Schedule an appointment with our sales executives.
FaqPage.Q19: I have questions about COFEPRIS procedures; can you help me?
FaqPage.A19: Of course! We will register your product with COFEPRIS and advise you on any questions you may have.
FaqPage.Q20: Do you offer support with brand registration?
FaqPage.A20: We can guide you to protect your brand and avoid legal issues.
FaqPage.A21: To ensure the quality and safety of your products, all materials must be carefully inspected and supplied by selected suppliers. For this reason, we cannot accept external materials.
FaqPage.A22: For any questions about contract manufacturing of supplements or other topics, write to us! Email: maquilas@aionsuplementos.com or WhatsApp: +52 33 1293 8626 / 33 1601 3763

PrivacyPage.title: PRIVACY NOTICE
PrivacyPage.paragraph_1: aion® Suplementos, Guadalajara Jalisco, is responsible for collecting your personal data, processing it, and ensuring its proper protection.
PrivacyPage.subtitle_1: PURPOSES OF PROCESSING AND PERSONAL DATA COLLECTED
PrivacyPage.paragraph_2: The personal data you provide will be incorporated into a database owned by aion® Suplementos. This notice contains information about how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information. We encourage you to read it carefully.
PrivacyPage.paragraph_3: Personal data will be used for any of the following purposes necessary for our relationship with you: (i) marketing our products and services (including related billing and collection purposes), (ii) managing your registration on the website (necessary for accessing certain information and participating in various activities), (iii) providing information about our promotions and contests, (iv) your participation in promotions or contests and, where applicable, delivering the corresponding prizes, (v) sending our electronic quality surveys and other activities related to the advertisement of our products and services, and (vi) contacting you.
PrivacyPage.paragraph_4: This Privacy Notice is available for consultation on our website:
PrivacyPage.paragraph_5: If you need to contact the person responsible for the processing of personal data at aion® Suplementos, please send an email to:
PrivacyPage.paragraph_6: The personal data we may require from you include: (i) full name; (ii) address; (iii) landline and/or mobile phone number; (iv) email; (v) age, among others. Additionally, if your purchases are made through a credit or debit card, we may also collect your card’s banking information, and for invoicing purposes, your taxpayer identification number (RFC) and billing address.
PrivacyPage.paragraph_7: Your personal data may be collected in different ways: when you purchase our products or services, provide them on our website or by calling our Customer Service Center, and when you participate in our promotions and contests.
PrivacyPage.paragraph_8: Personal data must always be provided truthfully and completely and will be updated with your cooperation. If the personal data you provide is false, incomplete, or outdated, aion® Suplementos is released from any potential responsibility, including failure to inform you of promotions or the inability to successfully deliver prizes you may have won.
PrivacyPage.paragraph_9: aion® Suplementos has implemented various controls and security measures to ensure your personal data remains confidential, preventing unauthorized access, use, potential damage, loss, or alteration.
PrivacyPage.subtitle_3: DATA OF MINORS OR INCAPACITATED PERSONS
PrivacyPage.paragraph_10: In cases where data of minors or incapacitated individuals is collected, aion® Suplementos will make its best efforts not to use it for purposes inappropriate for the minor's age or concerning the incapacitated individual.
PrivacyPage.paragraph_11: In any case, aion® Suplementos guarantees to handle requests derived from the exercise of access, cancellation, rectification, and opposition rights regarding minors' or incapacitated individuals' data by their parents or guardians.
PrivacyPage.subtitle_4: DATA TRANSFERS RELATING TO YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION
PrivacyPage.paragraph_12: Your personal data may be shared with third-party service providers and/or other affiliated companies, subsidiaries, or business partners within the same corporate group of aion® Suplementos, under the terms of section III of article 37 of the Federal Law on the Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties. However, your data may also be shared with authorities who may require it with proper justification.
PrivacyPage.subtitle_5: ARCO RIGHTS (ACCESS, RECTIFICATION, CANCELLATION, AND OPPOSITION)
PrivacyPage.paragraph_13: aion® Suplementos informs you that you have the right to exercise your access, rectification, cancellation, and opposition rights (ARCO rights) regarding personal data at any time by directly contacting the company through the following email address:
PrivacyPage.subtitle_6: USE OF COOKIES AND WEB BEACONS
PrivacyPage.paragraph_14: Our website uses “Cookies,” “Web Beacons,” and other “Monitoring Technologies” to provide better service and user experience. Major browsers allow disabling these technologies by following the steps in their settings.
PrivacyPage.paragraph_15: aion® Suplementos reserves the right to update and modify this Privacy Notice at any time. All modifications will be available on the websites and through information sent to the last email address provided by the owner.
